With Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, Axel Springer today honored one of the defining voices of the ‚ÄúIntelligence Age‚Äù at its Berlin headquarters. Altman received the Axel Springer Award 2025 for his role in bringing artificial intelligence from research labs into everyday life‚Äîwhile consistently emphasizing the societal responsibility tied to this technology. Highlights of the event are available in the video here: [...] The centerpiece of the evening was a conversation between Axel Springer CEO Mathias D√∂pfner and Sam Altman, focusing on freedom of expression, transatlantic relations, and the risks of artificial intelligence. Addressing Altman, D√∂pfner said: ‚ÄúOne of the main purposes of this award is to encourage entrepreneurship. To encourage a risk-taker culture.
